faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about SexyVoice.ai

questions.question: How does voice cloning work?
questions.answer: Our AI analyzes your voice samples to learn its unique patterns and characteristics. With just seconds of audio, we can create a digital voice that sounds just like you. The system uses advanced AI to match your tone, accent, and speaking style.

questions.question: Can I clone my own voice?
questions.answer: Yes! For ethical reasons, you need permission before cloning someone else's voice. We take voice rights seriously.

questions.question: Is my voice data secure?
questions.answer: Yes. We encrypt all voice data and store it securely. You control your audio generations completely and can delete them anytime. We never share your voice data with others without your permission. Your privacy is our priority.

questions.question: What can I use the generated voices for?
questions.answer: You can use generated voices for podcasts, videos, social media content, e-learning, audiobooks, games, and more. Many creators use our voices to save time recording or to maintain consistent audio quality. Just remember our terms prohibit deception or impersonation.

questions.question: How many credits do I need?
questions.answer: About 1,000 credits make 1 minute of audio. New users get 10,000 free credits (about 10 minutes of speech). Our Starter plan includes 30,000 monthly credits, while Pro offers 500,000 credits for bigger projects. Choose what works for your needs.

questions.question: What languages do you support?
questions.answer:
Language support depends on the selected voice when generating speech.

Some of our AI voices (Puck, Zephyr, Gacrux, Kore, Sulafat) support 24 languages including Arabic (Egyptian), English (US), French (France), German (Germany), Spanish (US), Hindi (India), Indonesian (Indonesia), Italian (Italy), Japanese (Japan), Korean (Korea), Portuguese (Brazil), Russian (Russia), Dutch (Netherlands), Polish (Poland), Thai (Thailand), Turkish (Turkey), Vietnamese (Vietnam), Romanian (Romania), Ukrainian (Ukraine), Bengali (Bangladesh), English/Hindi (India), Marathi (India), Tamil (India), and Telugu (India).

questions.question: Do you have an API for developers?
questions.answer: It's coming soon! Our API will let developers add voice generation to apps, websites, and games. You'll be able to create speech on demand and manage voice models programmatically with simple API calls.

questions.question: Why choose SexyVoice.ai?
questions.answer: We offer the best combination of voice quality, ease of use, and affordable pricing. Unlike competitors, we provide professional-grade voices for creators of all sizes. With generous free credits and no contracts, you can start creating amazing voice content right away.

questions.question: Is erotica or adult content generation allowed?
questions.answer: Yes, we allow adult and erotica content generation on our platform. We believe in creative freedom while maintaining responsible use. However, all content must comply with our terms of service and applicable laws. We prohibit content involving minors, non-consensual scenarios, or illegal activities.

questions.question: Can I make a voice speak with a specific accent or style, like British or pirate?
questions.answer: Yes! Choose a multilingual voice (for example, Zephyr) and add your instruction in the style box, like: 'Speak with a British accent' or 'Speak like a pirate.' The voice will instantly adapt. You can use this for accents, character voices, or unique speaking stylesâ€”experiment with different prompts until you find the perfect fit.
